channel.title: ♥☺♥ WoW-Scape - Updated Jan 9th, 2010 - Enchanting Skill ♥☺♥
channel.description:
[center]A lot of Work... a lot of work.... Will post pics in a few.. World of warcraft did a really good job with all there systems i just wanted to code all of this too see why other players havn't i have found that it is alot of work.... and more or less very advanced... [/center] [size=24pt]Programmers[/size] [b]☻Ddragonimp ( Penguin for some forums ) - Java ☻currently thats it.[/b] [center] Using a lot of wowWiki and worldofwarcraft.com[/center]
[code=What is coded in] Added Items Can now handle the Enchant - Jan 4 Items have the ability to Handle up to 2 Gem Enchant slots - Jan 4 Items have the ability to handle 1 Item use Enchant - Jan 4 Number of Enchants Done 5/500+ Requires Mats - Jan 5th Now Handles up to 7 Items, amounts - Jan 6th Requires Wand - Jan 5th Requires Enchanting Level - Jan 5th Combat Level - Based on Real Xp from World of warcraft This part is 100% - Jan 5th Based on 3 Files Enchant Files + Client - Jan 6th Added requestMats() - Jan 6th Added requestEnchantType() - Jan 6th Added updateEnchReq - Jan 6th Handles Up to 25 Quests - Jan 6 Handles up to 20 Dailies - Jan 6 Quests - Recalling works and writing to character file - 6th Dailys - Recalling and Writing to character file works - 6th Proper Banking - Stackable items are stackable Non stackable are Non Stackble - Jan 7th 3 New interfaces Jan 9th [/code] Plans On adding [code=what is not coded in] Bags Proper bank space Fully working Use On Item Gems Professions - Currently have 1 Done on started 1 - Leather Working When Trading, Dueling The Enchanted Item wont loose Enchant Gold being based on a point sytem Actual Quests Not Started Factions - that affect InGame play Races - That affect InGame Play - Currently have a Interface that doesnt work Classes - That affect InGame Play - Currently have a Interface that doesnt work Fully optimal Stats Found out Max hitpoints is 1063? based on client i believe finding away around that - post if you know anything... Npcs do not give Propper Xp yet Proper Combat Xp gain Skills - Nothing added so far (This is combat skills such as charge for a warrior)(will be using Custom Interfaces for this project) [/code]
[size=24pt]New Pics[/size] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/Enchantss.png[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/Interfaces.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/part8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/part9.png[/img]
[size=24pt]Old Interface[/size]
[IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/StartEnchanting4.png[/img]
[size=24pt]New Interface[/size]
[IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/part1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/part2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/part3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/part4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/part5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg72/Ddragonimp/part6.png[/img]

Ahh love Coding love it to death

New:Now requires Exactly the same Xp as World of warcraft does
jan 5th
New:Handles up to 25 Quest
New:and Handles up to 20 Dailies Per-day.
jan 6th
New:Banking - Stack able Items Stack, Non Stack able Items are in separate Slots
jan 7th

item.title: ♥☺♥ WoW-Scape - Updated Jan 9th, 2010 - Enchanting Skill ♥☺♥
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Updated… Noticed i had some bugs Redoing the interface
Enchanting wasn’t complete it wasn’t checking for material it was checking for 2 items
is now checking for material based on the enchant.cfg file

Enchanting wasn’t requiring wands
Requires up to 7 items
Item Requirement updating
1063 Max Hit points currently Trying to find away around it…
Updated Interface

Woots added a bunch of materials

Read full topic

item.title: ♥☺♥ WoW-Scape - Updated Jan 9th, 2010 - Enchanting Skill ♥☺♥
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:7, topic:376429”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=472361.msg3454705#msg3454705 date=1293966405]

Ill be the first Not currently Coded a server full time so i’ve been working on this full time.

You fucked up the gameframe, and your images all contain links. Might want to fix them both.

Uhh server isnt online if thats what you mean about contains Links?
and Yeah i know im trying to make it World of warcraft… Only sorta worked on it been doing server stuff more… im not done editing it. i have originals if i get lazy.

OHHHH That website doesnt even work…
This is a very basic Delta Source…

He meant the advertising part. People can see the links, just by looking in the chat box. That is technically advertising which breaks the rules.
[/quote]
is it still advertising if the Site doesnt work?[/quote]
Honestly, I don’t know. I couldn’t argue why or why not it would be, being that fact that it is a non-active non-working website, but it’s primarily up to the staff.

Read full topic

item.title: ♥☺♥ WoW-Scape - Updated Jan 9th, 2010 - Enchanting Skill ♥☺♥
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[center]A lot of Work… a lot of work…
Will post pics in a few…
World of warcraft did a really good job with all there systems i just wanted to code all of this too see why other players havn’t
i have found that it is alot of work…
and more or less very advanced…
[/center]
[size=24pt]Programmers[/size]
Ddragonimp ( Penguin for some forums ) - Java
currently thats it.
[center]
Using a lot of wowWiki and worldofwarcraft.com[/center]

Added Items Can now handle the Enchant - Jan 4
Items have the ability to Handle up to 2 Gem Enchant slots - Jan 4
Items have the ability to handle 1 Item use Enchant - Jan 4
Number of Enchants Done 5/500+
Requires Mats - Jan 5th
Now Handles up to 7 Items, amounts - Jan 6th
Requires Wand - Jan 5th
Requires Enchanting Level - Jan 5th
Combat Level - Based on Real Xp from World of warcraft This part is 100% - Jan 5th
Based on 3 Files Enchant Files + Client - Jan 6th
Added requestMats() - Jan 6th
Added requestEnchantType() - Jan 6th
Added updateEnchReq - Jan 6th
Handles Up to 25 Quests - Jan 6
Handles up to 20 Dailies - Jan 6
Quests - Recalling works and writing to character file - 6th
Dailys - Recalling and Writing to character file works - 6th
Proper Banking - Stackable items are stackable Non stackable are Non Stackble - Jan 7th
3 New interfaces Jan 9th

Plans On adding

Bags
Proper bank space
Fully working Use On Item Gems
Professions - Currently have 1 Done on started 1 - Leather Working
When Trading, Dueling The Enchanted Item wont loose Enchant
Gold being based on a point sytem
Actual Quests Not Started
Factions - that affect InGame play
Races - That affect InGame Play  - Currently have a Interface that doesnt work
Classes - That affect InGame Play  - Currently have a Interface that doesnt work
Fully optimal Stats
Found out Max hitpoints is 1063? based on client i believe finding away around that - post if you know anything...
Npcs do not give Propper Xp yet
Proper Combat Xp gain
Skills - Nothing added so far (This is combat skills such as charge for a warrior)(will be using Custom Interfaces for this project)

[size=24pt]New Pics[/size]

Enchantss.png739×462

Interfaces.png401×511


part9.png750×465

[size=24pt]Old Interface[/size]

StartEnchanting4.png762×525

part1.png722×458




part5.png720×719
